{
  productAreas{
    id
    name
    dataproducts {
        name
    }
    stories {
        name
    }
  }
}

RETURNS

{
  "data": {
    "productAreas": [
      {
        "id": "Mocked-001",
        "name": "Mocked Produktomr√•de",
        "dataproducts": [
          {
            "name": "NewName"
          }
        ],
        "stories": [
          {
            "name": "mystory"
          }
        ]
      }
    ]
  }
}
